FilterItemPortable.Name: Padrão
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="FILIAL"> <TableName>FN_DOCUMENTOS</TableName> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>em</Name> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Label>Filial</Label> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="APELIDO"> <TableName>Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS</TableName> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>contém</Name> <DatabaseOperator>LIKE</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> <ValueSubstitutionPattern>%{0}%</ValueSubstitutionPattern> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <Label>Usuario</Label> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="DATAPROCESSAMENTO"> <TableName>TQ_GERACAOFINANCEIROFISCAL</TableName> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>entre</Name> <DatabaseOperator>BETWEEN</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Label>Data</Label> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
